name: SISYPHUS
description:
Join Sisyphus in his quest for revenge in this physics-based platforming adventure where you control not only Sisyphus, but his magical rock as well.



  • Traverse from Hades’ Underworld to the top of Mount Olympus in 40+ levels of intense platforming challenges
  • Launch the rock with just a point and click
  • Crush enemies that block your path using your rock
  • Halt the rock with magic in order to land at just the right spot
  • Maneuver yourself as Sisyphus while still chained to your rock
  • Listen to original tracks for the Underworld and Overworld
  • Master gravity or die trying
